body.p:
WmsTown Dec 13th 1865
To his Excellency Thomas E Bramlet
Governor of the commonwealth of Ky

I would most respectfully represent to your Honor that A Houser a German from cincinnati was this day arrested and fined in two cases for Peddling without Licens the judgment in each case is $50.00 & costs the judgment was rendered by B N Carter a justice of the Peace for Grant county I prosecuted the cases -- I have heard that he has a large family & that his mother lives & is supported by him & that She is blind -- Houser is a Huckster & has heretofore conducted himself very well Has been passing through here for a year or more -- The object of this statement is to ask you to remit so much of the
fine as you can -- Hoping that you will not find it inconsisted with your convictions of right to do so

I am sir your obedient servt
W, T, Simmions Atty for Grant County
